data.eml:eml: Four subgenera of Bracon Fabricius (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Braconinae) newly recorded from China, with description of five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Yang, He, Jun-Hua, Chen, Xue-Xin (2016): Four subgenera of Bracon Fabricius (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Braconinae) newly recorded from China, with description of five new species. Zootaxa 4208 (5): 459-473, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4208.5.4
